<<<<<<< HEAD
A reply to a pamphlet called, Oaths no gospel-ordinance, &c. Wherein a sermon preached at Carlisle, Aug. 17. 1664. with all the arguments therein produced (to prove that our Saviour did not forbid all swearing) is fully vindicated ... / By Alan Smalwood ... Smallwood, Allan, 1608-1686. Howgill, Francis, 1618-1669. Oaths no gospel ordinance but prohibited by Christ.
[31], 438 p.
Printed by Stephen Bulkley, and are to be sold by Francis Mawbarne, York : 1667.
Imperfect: tight binding with some loss of print. Reproduction of original in: Friends' Library (London, England).
=======
